verbose_text: Taken together, these data and our results confirm the critical role of aggrecanases in cartilage destruction and suggest that a controlled level of MMP mediated aggrecanolysis may be needed for cartilage homeostasis, and possibly repair, as MMPs proteolysis can facilitate cell migration, regulate tissue architecture, release and activate ECM bound growth factors and signaling molecules XREF_BIBR.
evidence: MMPs proteolysis can facilitate cell migration, regulate tissue architecture, release and activate ECM
